title: How placement in season 8 work?
body:
I just want to say how the season placement work?
Some say that i would be bronze if i was brozne the last season, is it true?
i will be very sad because ihate bronze elo and i don'T deserve that, because i have a mmr of silver 3 in op.gg
What i would be if i have 10 games won if i was bronze last season

replies.body: Your MMR is hidden, and third party sites likely don't have the correct data. Overall, your previous rank *does* factor into your new placements, and keep in mind the ladder shifts downwards when the season starts.

If you were bronze in the previous season, you're likely to be placed close to where you were. However, if you've improved between then and now, you might see it raise equally. Keep doing your best in your placement matches and you'll probably get placed there! Good luck!
